definition: enemy/to be a match for/to rival/to resist/to withstand
disposition of troops/wave/spate/burst/spell/short period of time/classifier for events or states of short duration

sentences.english: My army is launching a fierce attack on the enemy position.
sentences.chinese: 我所在的部隊向敵陣發起了一波猛烈地攻擊。

sentences.english: Jinetes hurl their javelins before closing in and fighting with their cavalry swords.
sentences.chinese: 對敵時列成圓陣，標槍飛擲，然後揮動長劍殺入敵陣。
